column1: 845,Avengers (1998) #502,502,93100,9,AVENGERS DISASSEMBLED CONTINUES!  PART 3 (OF 4)  There's been a lot of buzz around this big Avengers event and this issue is what everyone is waiting for. Who will fall at the hands of the Avengers' greatest enemy?
